attributes.action: Abolish the BBC Television License Fee
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The BBC TV License is unfair.  This is a fee that is forced upon every person who owns a television set or device capable of receiving a television signal.  £131 per year...and rising, when will it end?  There are people in the UK who have no interest in the the broadcasts of the BBC so if you are one of these people sign this petition and take a stand against this charge which has been in force for far too long.

People should have the right to own a TV  without having to pay for a service that they do not use.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
